skillTree.localised_description: Sofia developed an addiction to using her magic, to feeling power coursing through her veins. Sofia has become reckless when using her magical power, the lust for glory eating at what little remains of her soul.

effects.description: Ability: "Winds of Addiction"

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases when nearby allies cast spells.

skillTree.localised_description: A blackened pyre of the living and the damned, thrown together and burnt for the glory of Sofia.

effects.description: Ability: "Doomed Pyre"

skillTree.localised_description: Violent beams of light spring forth from Sofia's hands, sweeping through the massed ranks of her enemies. Only the hardiest amongst them will survive her onslaught.

effects.description: Ability: "Unholy Retribution"

skillTree.localised_description: Enemies who perish at Sofia's hands have the grim misfortune of having their souls torn from the afterlife and used to animate the skulls that formerly perched atop their skeletons.

effects.description: Ability: "Bones of the Damned"

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Damned Skulls

skillTree.localised_description: "That is not dead which can eternal lie, and with strange aeons even death may die."

skillTree.localised_description: Those bound to Sofia through the Well of Souls are eternally tied to her mortal form. It is likely little compensation for such brutal slavery that she enhances what few abilities they have left.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
